article: Five-year-old Marry loved to play in the street with her friends. This made her parents  _  . They did  _  to keep her off the street.  _  , day after day they found her out there. Thankfully, the street wasn't very  _  . But it was often traveled by soldiers and sometimes they would drive very fast. Every time he drove by the lifeless animal that had  _  in the road, Steven  _  think of his daughter. And so he continued trying to teach her the  _  -- with little  _  . Then one day as Steven was driving home, he saw something that helped  _  an idea, which became an action by the time he got home. He walked over to where Marry was playing. "Come on, sweetheart," he said. "You and Daddy are going for a  _  ." They drove back along the way he had just traveled, finally  _  just behind a mound of something. "What is it, Daddy?" Marry asked as they got out of the  _  . "Look  _  , but don't touch it," Steven said. "Can't you tell what it is?" She studied it for a few minutes, unsure of its  _  until she picked out its familiar ears. "A rabbit! What happened?" Marry asked. "It was playing in the road, and a car came along and ..." "... and squished it?" Marry broke  _  . "That's right," Steven said. "It got squished because it was playing in the road." "Yuck!" Marry said. This is Steven's lesson.
